The level of service by Serenity Funeral Service is superb. From the time of activation until the time that the funeral service is over, the physical and spiritual support was endless. Their punctuality and guidance throughout was truly commendable, as this was my first time organising a funeral for a loved one. We have been greatly blessed by their services. We only needed to call them and inform them our need when my brother passed away. They were able to effectively advise and recommended suitable funeral package according to our financial ability. All the necessary bookings for the funeral wake to the cremation and ash management were fully organised from start to finish. Their logistical partner also gave their full support and set up the wake location within 2 hours, and the wake went full steam thereafter. My family and I were deeply grateful for their seamless support, making our difficult time more bearable.

We would like to express our gratitude to Serenity and the team who assisted us throughout the bereavement. They are very prompt to respond and give their best support to guide my family through the whole process - from embalming to setting up and cremation - it went very smoothly.
The tentages are beautifully set up, giving a sense of peace for family and friends.

We are very grateful for Jessy and team for supporting and rendering help to us wherever needed through these difficult times. Their services, attitudes have truly exceeded our expectations. Thank you!
